column4: im having a problem getting a windows7 raid0 machine to use grub and boot ubuntu. i've tried installing it to the active partition but it refuses to work :/
grub does not install to a partition, it installed to the embedded area.
well i install unbuntu 9.10 and click advanced to set where to put grub but it does not install to where i set it. and when the system restarts it boots right into windows
it can be installed to the enbedded partition of the area tho correct? because i've used a bootloader to load another bootloader before
